title: So i just won a ranked game
body: I am aware of the issue with LP gains, but does this mean I got scammed and i'm not getting my LP?

replies.body: AFAIK you're still getting all of that LP on the backend, this is just some weird visual bug where it never shows you the total that you got.
so since I am on 83 LP(I played some games today from which I got LP and lost LP) i can just wait and I will get into promos when this is fixed and I get the LP for that one game, right?

Looks like Riot Eambo is covering what happened and what's going to happen with the LP issues [**right over here**](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements-en/0vGdGM9o-issues-with-ranked-games-not-recording-lp-changes).
